entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.1°C

Humidity: 81 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
